metadata.name: 🙏ADJACENT🌊WAVE 1🙏
metadata.description:
1/1 4 you, 2 you. 

This comes with the 4K version, and unlocks perks 4 you, as your wallet address crystallises this NFT, you will have become crystalline; joining the waves of many 2 come, with earlier realises, giveaways, and invites to many realms. 

The value gained from this, I will use to fund the rest of my rap experiences and progress, so my value rises adjacent to yours. Peace and love fellow human🌍Stay crystalline 💎
